capability.name: Consumer Loan
capability.definition: This service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product. This includes the initial set-up of the loan facility and the completion of scheduled and ad-hoc product processing tasks
capability.role: The consumer loan product may include different properties/features depending on a bank's preferences and policies. The loan is targeted at consumer customer and may be associated with a type of product and may or may not be secured by collateral.
capability.example: A consumer customer applies for and gets a loan to purchase new furniture.

key_features.name: Set-up a consumer loan facility
key_features.description: Enables set-up a consumer loan facility to support this service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product

key_features.name: Handle deposits and withdrawals
key_features.description: Enables handle deposits and withdrawals to support this service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product

key_features.name: Provide statements and assessment reports on the loan
key_features.description: Enables provide statements and assessment reports on the loan to support this service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product

key_features.name: Support loan restructuring
key_features.description: Enables support loan restructuring to support this service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product
